name: Sample Capability Statement for configuration of onFHIR.io
description: This is a sample Capability Statement to demonstrate how you can configure onFHIR.io and setup a FHIR server that meet your requirements...

software.name: onFHIR.io Secure FHIR Repository Sample Server

security.description: This is the Capability Statement to declare that the server supports SMART-on-FHIR. See the SMART-on-FHIR docs for the extension that would go with such a server

searchParam.name: codex-age
searchParam.documentation: Search on extension providing the age

searchParam.name: codex-ethnicity
searchParam.documentation: Search on extension providing the ethnicity

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: A patient identifier

searchParam.name: given
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the given name of the patient

searchParam.name: address
searchParam.documentation: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text

searchParam.name: birthdate
searchParam.documentation: The patient's date of birth

searchParam.name: deceased
searchParam.documentation: This patient has been marked as deceased, or as a death date entered

searchParam.name: address-state
searchParam.documentation: A state specified in an address

searchParam.name: gender
searchParam.documentation: Gender of the patient

searchParam.name: general-practitioner
searchParam.documentation: Patient's nominated general practitioner, not the organization that manages the record

searchParam.name: link
searchParam.documentation: All patients linked to the given patient

searchParam.name: active
searchParam.documentation: Whether the patient record is active

searchParam.name: language
searchParam.documentation: Language code (irrespective of use value)

searchParam.name: address-postalcode
searchParam.documentation: A postalCode specified in an address

searchParam.name: address-country
searchParam.documentation: A country specified in an address

searchParam.name: death-date
searchParam.documentation: The date of death has been provided and satisfies this search value

searchParam.name: phonetic
searchParam.documentation: A portion of either family or given name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm

searchParam.name: phone
searchParam.documentation: A value in a phone contact

searchParam.name: organization
searchParam.documentation: The organization that is the custodian of the patient record

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text

searchParam.name: address-use
searchParam.documentation: A use code specified in an address

searchParam.name: telecom
searchParam.documentation: The value in any kind of telecom details of the patient

searchParam.name: family
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the family name of the patient

searchParam.name: address-city
searchParam.documentation: A city specified in an address

searchParam.name: email
searchParam.documentation: A value in an email contact

searchParam.name: severity
searchParam.documentation: The severity of the condition

searchParam.name: evidence-detail
searchParam.documentation: Supporting information found elsewhere

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: A unique identifier of the condition record

searchParam.name: onset-info
searchParam.documentation: Onsets as a string

searchParam.name: recorded-date
searchParam.documentation: Date record was first recorded

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Code for the condition

searchParam.name: evidence
searchParam.documentation: Manifestation/symptom

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Who has the condition?

searchParam.name: verification-status
searchParam.documentation: unconfirmed | provisional | differential | confirmed | refuted | entered-in-error

searchParam.name: clinical-status
searchParam.documentation: The clinical status of the condition

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: Encounter created as part of

searchParam.documentation: Date related onsets (dateTime and Period)

searchParam.name: abatement-date
searchParam.documentation: Date-related abatements (dateTime and period)

searchParam.name: asserter
searchParam.documentation: Person who asserts this condition

searchParam.name: stage
searchParam.documentation: Simple summary (disease specific)

searchParam.name: abatement-string
searchParam.documentation: Abatement as a string

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who has the condition?

searchParam.name: onset-age
searchParam.documentation: Onsets as age or age range

searchParam.name: abatement-age
searchParam.documentation: Abatement as age or age range

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: The category of the condition

searchParam.name: body-site
searchParam.documentation: Anatomical location, if relevant

searchParam.documentation: Search on Consent.provision.provision.code

searchParam.documentation: Search on Consent.provision.provision.period

searchParam.documentation: Search on both provision code and period

searchParam.name: mii-provision-provision-type
searchParam.documentation: Search on Consent.provision.provision.type

searchParam.documentation: Search on both code and type of Consent.provision.provision

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: When this Consent was created or indexed

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Identifier for this record (external references)

searchParam.name: period
searchParam.documentation: Timeframe for this rule

searchParam.name: data
searchParam.documentation: The actual data reference

searchParam.name: purpose
searchParam.documentation: Context of activities covered by this rule

searchParam.name: source-reference
searchParam.documentation: Search by reference to a Consent, DocumentReference, Contract  or QuestionnaireResponse

searchParam.name: actor
searchParam.documentation: Resource for the actor (or group, by role)

searchParam.name: security-label
searchParam.documentation: Security Labels that define affected resources

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who the consent applies to

searchParam.name: organization
searchParam.documentation: Custodian of the consent

searchParam.name: scope
searchParam.documentation: Which of the four areas this resource covers (extensible)

searchParam.name: action
searchParam.documentation: Actions controlled by this rule

searchParam.name: consentor
searchParam.documentation: Who is agreeing to the policy and rules

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: Classification of the consent statement - for indexing/retrieval

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: draft | proposed | active | rejected | inactive | entered-in-error

searchParam.documentation: The unique identifier associated with the specimen container

searchParam.documentation: The code for the body site from where the specimen originated

searchParam.documentation: The subject of the specimen

searchParam.documentation: The patient the specimen comes from

searchParam.name: collected
searchParam.documentation: The date the specimen was collected

searchParam.name: accession
searchParam.documentation: The accession number associated with the specimen

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: The specimen type

searchParam.documentation: Who collected the specimen

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Obtained date/time. If the obtained element is a period, a date that falls in the period

searchParam.name: combo-data-absent-reason
searchParam.documentation: The reason why the expected value in the element Observation.value[x] or Observation.component.value[x] is missing.

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: The code of the observation type

searchParam.name: combo-code-value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: Code and quantity value parameter pair, including in components

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The subject that the observation is about

searchParam.name: component-data-absent-reason
searchParam.documentation: The reason why the expected value in the element Observation.component.value[x] is missing.

searchParam.name: value-concept
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

searchParam.name: value-date
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a date or period of time

searchParam.name: focus
searchParam.documentation: The focus of an observation when the focus is not the patient of record.

searchParam.name: derived-from
searchParam.documentation: Related measurements the observation is made from

searchParam.name: part-of
searchParam.documentation: Part of referenced event

searchParam.name: has-member
searchParam.documentation: Related resource that belongs to the Observation group

searchParam.name: code-value-string
searchParam.documentation: Code and string value parameter pair

searchParam.name: component-code-value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: Component code and component quantity value parameter pair

searchParam.name: based-on
searchParam.documentation: Reference to the service request.

searchParam.name: code-value-date
searchParam.documentation: Code and date/time value parameter pair

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The subject that the observation is about (if patient)

searchParam.name: specimen
searchParam.documentation: Specimen used for this observation

searchParam.name: component-code
searchParam.documentation: The component code of the observation type

searchParam.name: code-value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: Code and quantity value parameter pair

searchParam.name: combo-code-value-concept
searchParam.documentation: Code and coded value parameter pair, including in components

searchParam.name: value-string
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a string, and also searches in CodeableConcept.text

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: The unique id for a particular observation

searchParam.name: performer
searchParam.documentation: Who performed the observation

searchParam.name: combo-code
searchParam.documentation: The code of the observation type or component type

searchParam.name: method
searchParam.documentation: The method used for the observation

searchParam.name: value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

searchParam.name: component-value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: The value of the component observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

searchParam.name: data-absent-reason
searchParam.documentation: The reason why the expected value in the element Observation.value[x] is missing.

searchParam.name: combo-value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: The value or component value of the observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: Encounter related to the observation

searchParam.name: code-value-concept
searchParam.documentation: Code and coded value parameter pair

searchParam.name: component-code-value-concept
searchParam.documentation: Component code and component coded value parameter pair

searchParam.name: component-value-concept
searchParam.documentation: The value of the component observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: The classification of the type of observation

searchParam.name: device
searchParam.documentation: The Device that generated the observation data.

searchParam.name: combo-value-concept
searchParam.documentation: The value or component value of the observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The status of the observation

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Return administrations with this external identifier

searchParam.name: request
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a request to list administrations from

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Return administrations of this medication code

searchParam.name: performer
searchParam.documentation: The identity of the individual who administered the medication

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The identity of the individual or group to list administrations for

searchParam.name: medication
searchParam.documentation: Return administrations of this medication resource

searchParam.name: reason-given
searchParam.documentation: Reasons for administering the medication

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a patient to list administrations  for

searchParam.name: effective-time
searchParam.documentation: Date administration happened (or did not happen)

searchParam.name: context
searchParam.documentation: Return administrations that share this encounter or episode of care

searchParam.name: reason-not-given
searchParam.documentation: Reasons for not administering the medication

searchParam.name: device
searchParam.documentation: Return administrations with this administration device identity

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: MedicationAdministration event status (for example one of active/paused/completed/nullified)

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: A date within the period the Encounter lasted

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Identifier(s) by which this encounter is known

searchParam.name: participant-type
searchParam.documentation: Role of participant in encounter

searchParam.name: practitioner
searchParam.documentation: Persons involved in the encounter other than the patient

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The patient or group present at the encounter

searchParam.name: length
searchParam.documentation: Length of encounter in days

searchParam.name: episode-of-care
searchParam.documentation: Episode(s) of care that this encounter should be recorded against

searchParam.name: diagnosis
searchParam.documentation: The diagnosis or procedure relevant to the encounter

searchParam.name: appointment
searchParam.documentation: The appointment that scheduled this encounter

searchParam.name: part-of
searchParam.documentation: Another Encounter this encounter is part of

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: Specific type of encounter

searchParam.name: reason-code
searchParam.documentation: Coded reason the encounter takes place

searchParam.name: participant
searchParam.documentation: Persons involved in the encounter other than the patient

searchParam.name: based-on
searchParam.documentation: The ServiceRequest that initiated this encounter

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The patient or group present at the encounter

searchParam.name: reason-reference
searchParam.documentation: Reason the encounter takes place (reference)

searchParam.name: location-period
searchParam.documentation: Time period during which the patient was present at the location

searchParam.name: location
searchParam.documentation: Location the encounter takes place

searchParam.name: service-provider
searchParam.documentation: The organization (facility) responsible for this encounter

searchParam.name: special-arrangement
searchParam.documentation: Wheelchair, translator, stretcher, etc.

searchParam.name: class
searchParam.documentation: Classification of patient encounter

searchParam.name: account
searchParam.documentation: The set of accounts that may be used for billing for this Encounter

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: planned | arrived | triaged | in-progress | onleave | finished | cancelled +

searchParam.documentation: Provides support for reverse chaining

searchParam.documentation: Type of resource (when doing cross-resource search

searchParam.documentation: How to sort the resources when returning

searchParam.name: _count
searchParam.documentation: How many resources to return

searchParam.documentation: Control over returning additional resources (see spec)

searchParam.documentation: Profiles this resource claims to conform to
